content: --साहसः, --सं {1} the highest (of the fixed) pecuniary punishments; a fine of 1000 (or according to some 80,000) paṇas; <ls>Ms. 9. 240</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 365</ls>; पणानां द्वे शते सार्धे प्रथमः साहसः स्मृतः . मध्यमः पंचविज्ञेयः सहस्रं त्वेष चोत्तमः ... Capital punishment, banishment, confiscation, and mutilation are also regarded as forms of this punishment.
